history.proof: intros. qsimpl use: In_perm. qsimpl use: in_split,In_perm. srun best use: in_split, Permutation_in.

exceptions.tactic: intros X l2 l1 H x Hin.
intros X' l2 l1 H x Hin.
intros X' l2' l1 H x Hin.
intros X' l2' l1' H x Hin.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hin was not found in the current environment.
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2" on hypothesis of type "l1 ~p l2".
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 4 branches.

original: intros X l2 l1 H x Hin. apply In_perm in Hin. destruct Hin as [m Hperm]. apply in_split in H. destruct H as [l [r Heq]]. exists l, r. rewrite Heq in Hperm. auto.
